data.text: @RicablancaRomma You're welcome! :)
@ajlbuste @AllisonSuga14 Hi, AJ. May we know more details about your concern? Please let us know how we can assist you. Thank you.
@KLCreativeStd We replied to your direct message, KL. Thank you.
@AllisonSuga14 Hi, AllisonSuga. We regret to learn of your disappointments. May we know more details of your concern?
@misscamelle_ Hi, Camille. We are sorry to hear this. We sent you a direct message. Thank you.
@treblaman We apologize for the inconvenience, Treb. We have noted we already replied to your direct message. Thank you.

@romatorres Hi, Mary. We are sorry to hear this. Your call may not be attended to right away due to high volume of calls being received by our hotline. May we know more details about your concern so we can assist you further?
@unicornsuns20 Hi, Louise. We sent you a DM to further assist you. Please check. Thank you.
@lateralraises Hi, Oikawa. This item is accepted for check-in. Thank you.
@Abdullah_ALrbdi Hi, Abdullah. Apologies for the delay. We will check with the handling officer. Kindly wait for updates. Thank you.
@treblaman Hello, Treb. We have sent you a DM. Thank you.
@JennisaLalisan You're welcome, Jennisa!
@prodsugad2 We are happy to hear this, Aj. See you on board!
@prodsugad2 Hello, Aj. We are sorry to hear this. May we know if you have also tried booking for a flight thru our website? Thank you.
@JennisaLalisan Hello, Jennisa. We have sent you a DM. Kindly check. Thank you.
@DamselGard Hello, Damsel. We are sorry to hear this. May we know the number you are trying to call? May we also confirm if you have tried redeeming your travel credits thru our website? Thank you.
@AmpoloquioLezel Hello, Lezel. How may we help you?
@ymjinscart We've sent you a Dm.
@ymjinscart Hi, Mika. We are sorry to hear this. We are unable to send you a DM. This may be due to your account's privacy settings. May you kindly check? Thank you.
@upandflyin Hi Mariyeta. We can no longer provide a copy of a used ticket. What we can provide you is a boarding certificate which you can request from our Records Department (rimd@pal.com.ph).
@missdario We're sorry about this, Macky. To further assist you on this, we've sent you a DM.

@DakilaReyes @maansantos28 We are truly sorry to hear this, Dakila. Rest assured that we have taken note of your feedback. We believe passenger feedback is important in improving our services and processes. Thank you and keep safe.
@yotsumak You may verify this directly with our check-in agents at the airport, @yotsumak. Thank you.
@DakilaReyes @maansantos28 Hi, DakilaReyes. We're truly sorry for the way we've made you feel. Please know that it is never our intention to cause any disservice. :(
@mommi_joanne @KLCreativeStd We have sent you a DM. Thank you.

@yotsumak Hi, Beck. We highly advise you to have your umbrella checked in. Our check in agents may tagged it separately. However, please note that all items are subject to final assessment at the airport. Thank you.
@maansantos28 Hi, Maan! We're so sorry for the delay. We've sent you a DM for us to assist you properly. Kindly check.
@maansantos28 We sincerely apologize for the delay, Maan. We sent you a message. Kindly check your inbox.
@Cruel62Foster Hi, Charlie. We're sorry for the delay. Kindly check our DM for us to assist you further on your refund concern.

@Watani_ksa Our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience. Upon checking, the flight was delayed due to operational requirements. We understand that you intend to depart as scheduled, however your safety is our priority. We hope to be of better service to you in the future.
@KayBusgano Hi, Makay. We have this noted. Kindly check our DM for us to assist you with your concern.
@Watani_ksa Hi. We're sorry to hear about your experience. Kindly allow us to check on this, please see our DM for us to proceed.
@shenaira_29 You're welcome!
@shenaira_29 Hi, Rosary! You may send an email request to web_ereceipt@pal.com.ph along with your booking details :)
@Scribe31oz We have sent you a DM, Linda.
@Scribe31oz Hi Linda. We're sorry about this. Kindly follow us so we could send you a DM. Thank you.
@erf_da Hi FG. We sent you a DM.
@renzoiscalma We are truly sorry for the inconvenience, Osner. We have noted we replied to your direct message.
@thejerrynation Our apologies for the inconvenience, Jerrynash. May we know your flight number so we can have this checked?
@den0322 We've sent you a dm, Denna. Kindly check.
@annakarrenina We have responded. Kindly check.
@elyanohoho Hi, €]lo. We have sent you a direct message for further assistance on this.
@mharicehl May we confirm if it was through PAL directly or through Travel Agency?
@nasserabalkhai1 Hi, nasser. We have sent you a DM. Thank you!
@mala_villanueva Hello, Mala. Our sincerest apologies for this. Kindly allow us to request for a follow-up from the handling office. Thank you.
@mharicehl We have sent you a DM, ♥️iamcehl♥️. Thank you!
@mharicehl Hi, iamcehl. This needs to be corrected also. May we ask where you booked your flight?
@mslalisamanobal Hi, J. We have sent you a DM. Thank you.

@SladeWyatt1 (2/2) Our flight schedules are subject. We may have to cancel, add, or adjust our planned flights, based on international and provincial entry restrictions as well as COVID testing/quarantine limitations at specific airports. Read more on this: https://t.co/BZXdb1zNXe

Thank you.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

urls.title: Log in or sign up to view
urls.description: See posts, photos and more on Facebook.

data.text:
@SladeWyatt1 (1/2) Hi, Slade. As of the moment, we still do not have updates regarding the resumption of our Perth flights. For more information regarding flight schedules, you may refer to this link:

https://t.co/IZlVVCBkZp
@KMoreno16_ Hi, Kent. We have yet to receive feedback from the office concerned. We will keep you updated regarding your ticket refund. Thank you for your patience.
@nissicuartero Hi, nissicuartero. We have sent you a DM. Thank you.
@real_egospare Hi, E. We're so sorry for the delay on your refund. We've responded to your DM as well and we assure you that we will update you once we have further news regarding this.
@onllarena We are truly sorry for the inconvenience, onllarena. We will message you back for further updates. Thank you.

@Salehinho3 Hi, Saleh. For voluntary refunding, this will depend on your fare rules and ticket restrictions. We highly suggest that you directly coordinate with your issuing agent for further assistance on this.

@onllarena Again, our sincerest apologies for this. We highly appreciate bringing this matter to our attention. 

(2/2)
@nikcartforbts We've sent you a dm. Kindly check.
@clydebarretto Hi, Clyde. As checked, an email was sent last August 10, 2022 at 4:52 pm. May we clarify if you did not receive it?

@lostpapillon21 We're truly sorry to hear your disappointment, Lostpapillon21. :( We assure you that we wouldn't disrupt a flight unless it was deemed necessary. We'll send you a dm so we can look into this.
@EES418 We're sorry to hear this, EE418. We'll send you a dm.
@nikcartforbts Noted, Nicart. Have you tried coordinating with your issuing agent directly for further assistance on this?
@nikcartforbts Hi, Nicart. May we clarify if you booked directly with PAL?
@xthinee Hi, Pepay. We sent you a direct message. Thank you.
@den0322 Kindly provide more details on your concern, Denna.
@pauiegabisan We sent you a message, Paulina. Kindly check your inbox.
@den0322 Hi, Denna. May we know more details about your concern?
@jks_jam Hi, Jam. We sent you a DM. Kindly check. Thank you.
@Du_Dzaii Hi, Daidai. We sent you a message. Thank you.
@GopalPa73189857 We sent you a message, Gopal. Kindly check your inbox.

urls.title: Prepaid baggage
urls.description: No need to worry about your travel essentials! Save more versus excess fees at the airport. Check-in smoothly at the airport. Rates are per sector and vary per destination. Please refer to the rates and guidelines below. PH – Hong Kong or v.v. USD 45 PH – Port Moresby or v.v. USD 65 PH – Sydney/Melbourne or v.v. USD 95 PH – Tel Aviv or v.v. USD 165 PH – Singapore or v.v. USD 45 PH – Phnom Penh or v.v. USD 45 PH – Hong Kong or v.v. HKD 380 PH – Shanghai or v.v. CNY 320 PH – Denpasar or v.v. IDR 630000 PH

data.text: @Alhadlag Hi. We sent you a DM to further assist you. Please check. Thank you.
@CaturayJr This is noted. May we ask if you could change your settings so we can send you a direct message?
@CaturayJr Hi, Warlito. How can we help?
@pauiegabisan Hi, Paulina. May we ask when and where refund was requested?
@iamzonitamaria Hi, Zonita. We sent you a message. Kindly check your inbox.
@minacabral We sent you a message, Mheena. Please check your inbox.
@iamzonitamaria Hi, Zonita. We have sent you a DM to assist you with your seat concern. Thank you.
@karizammm We have sent you a DM to assist you on schedule and seat concerns, Karissa. Kindly check. Thank you.
@jodelvargas Hi, Del. Thank you for booking with us. See you on board soon! ❤✈
@mardy61259298 We have sent you a DM so we can check on this further, Mar. Thank you.

@mardy61259298 Your itinerary receipt will be sent to your e-mail address within 48 hours after the successful posting of your payment. If you will still not receive your itinerary within 48 hours from payment, you may send us another message. Thank you.
@atienzakev Hi, Kevin. We have sent you a DM to assist you on your refund concern. Thank you.
@karizammm Hi Karissa, good morning. How may we help you? Thank you.
@mardy61259298 Hi, Mar. How may we help you with your payment? Thank you.
@janeth16823824 We have sent you a DM to further assist you on your refund concern, Janeth. Thank you.
@xoxkapetalli You're welcome, Rose. :)
@janeth16823824 Hi, Janeth. We regret to learn of your refund concern. May we confirm if you are trying to submit a refund request? Thank you.
@renzoiscalma We have sent you a DM, Osner. Thank you.
@bevieberry Yes, B. You will have to coordinate with the terminating station to file the claim for damaged baggage. Thank you.

@sisonnn Hello, Matthew. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We have noted that we are in correspondence with you via DM and Messenger. Please know that we are currently in coordination with the office concerned regarding your baggage. Thank you for your patience.
@renzoiscalma We are unable to send you a DM. May we request to change your account settings or kindly send us a DM, for us to assist you regarding your baggage concern? Thank you.
@sisonnn Hi, Matthew. We regret to learn of your baggage concern. We have sent you a DM to assist you in this regard. Thank you.
@renzoiscalma Hi, Osner. Our apologies for the inconvenience. May we know if you were able to file a report upon arrival?

@jks_jam Hi, Jam. This will depend on the aircraft that your flight will utilize. It will be best to call our hotline for further assistance on this. 

https://t.co/ckMLfaXddq

You may also check the link below for further details on this.

https://t.co/ZvmgSNi769

data.text: @jimvicdy Hi, Gold's Jim. Elite Mabuhay Miles members will receive an additional luggage allowance of ten (10) kg flying on Philippine Airlines (except to/from USA, Canada, Middle East, Japan, and Guam) and PAL Express.
@lulwaAlabdula We're sorry to hear this, L. We assure you that we wouldn't disrupt a flight unless it was deemed necessary. We'll send you a dm.
@NemoAxel Hi, Axel. We're sorry to hear this. Our @PALMabuhayMiles should be able to assist you. Kindly coordinate with them directly.
@_got17 Our apologies for this, kcé🔗👷‍♀️. We have sent you a dm. Kindly check.
@kunuhamru23 Thank YOU for flying with us, Anika!
